title: The case for shared sanitation access in informal settlements: A dialogue on science, policy, and practice integration
content: by Sarah Lebu, Lauren Sprouse, John Apambilla Akudago, Felix R. B. Twinomucunguzi, Ruthie Rosenberg, Yvonne Sanyu Lugali, Barbra Mary Aine, Jackqueline Tu-uyen Nguyen, Chimdi Catherine Muoghalu, Swaib Semiyaga, Barbara Evans, Musa Manga
author: Sarah Lebu
